reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress well-fitting and comfortable, particularly appreciating how the long sleeves keep them cozy.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars It makes me feel so sexy and feminine!
items.body: I love how this dress fits and feels, and I just love the pretty lavender color of the one I bought. It makes me feel so sexy and feminine when I match it with a nice pair of silky and shiny nude pantyhose and high heels. It's form fitting and so comfortable to wear all day. It's thin, but it will keep you warm enough. What else can I say, I just love this dress! Read more
items.author: Lenny S.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome dress!
items.body: I wore this for my babyshower and I loved it! Very comfortable! Not see through at all, lovely color, great fit! My only complaint was the the sleeves fit me kinda strangely so I wore a cardigan over it and problem solved. I definitely recommend this to anyone who is looking for a nice casual maternity dress who still wants to feel sexy or beautiful! Very simple dress but the side rouching (idk how to spell it lol) is very flattering and the dress is super easy to dress up or down! Definitely if you’re thinking of ordering do it! I’m so glad I did! Read more
items.author: Mikayla

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice for the colder months
items.body: I wanted a dress that had a little sexiness to it but warm enough to wear in the winter. This dress understood the assignment! The material is good, warm, and very stretchy. You could probably size down if you want it to be more form fitting. Even though it fit me well, it definitely had room. For reference, I am 5'2", 160, and wearing a medium. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great basic black dress
items.body: Nice ,flattering ,basic and stretch long sleeves black dress. Tons of complements, perfect to hide my belly .. the dress made me a nice shape body, the fabric is thin and stretchy very confortable to wear. Fair price for a basic black dress with tons of possibilities to play with.For references I bought a size M, my height is 5.6 and my weight is around 175-180lbs. Read more
items.author: Laura Silva

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the look
items.body: This is very comfortable. You can wear it casually or dress it up with a belt for a more formal look. I love how confident it makes me feel. I think I'll buy another one. Read more
items.author: Ranico

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Stay true to your size
items.body: Based on other reviews I ordered a Medium but it was too tight. I am 5’3 and 160 pounds. A large would have fit better. The dress was see through while I was wearing a black bra. The material is not too thin. Personally I think it’s good for beginning fall or late spring since it’s not too thick but cozy. I did not like the feel of the dress on my neck so those that do not like turtle necks may want to steer clear. Read more
items.author: Christy R.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this dress!
items.body: This dress fits true to size, so slimming and comfortable!! I want to buy another one that's not black Read more
items.author: Lisa

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars disgusted
items.body: I would never order anything else my item came used with deodorant, stains all on it under the arms & everything I’m very disappointed never have I ever received used items Read more
items.author: Natasha

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Bodycon Ruched is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Bodycon Ruched is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Gray, Wine Red, Purple, Dark Grey, Black, Mustard, Coffee. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
